subject: Video and linear scan
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_513f_251f_70dd
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

I have to wonder how video would work with linear scan instead of random. 
This picture was a result of adapting a random voltage generator to a small 
portable TV, the tuning voltage has to be brought up to 30 volts (0 to 30V). 
See the circled areas that cause me to believe it's a paranormal pix. I 
haven't done anymore with video since last year.

Frank
